attributes.action: Make Cold Drinking Water Free In All Places Where Physical Exercise takes place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last night at the Birmingham City Council Erdington Fitness Center / Gym i found out that cold drinking water had to be payed for. Doing Physical Exercise requires constant hydration and when your water bottle is running low you need to have a source where you can fill it up immediately to prevent dehydration and possible collapse.
